column2: "Ɔbaa onyansafo biara ɔkyekyer ne fie: Na ɔkwasea no dze
column3: ɔdze ne nsa dwuruw ne fie gu."

column2: "Nyia ɔnantsew no tɔɔtsen mu no
column3: odzi EWURADZE nyi. Na nyia ɔkyeakyea n’akwan no dze

column2: "Ɔkwasea anomu na nkontompɔ abaa wɔ: Na onyansafo ano dze
"Mbrɛ anantwi nnyi no
column3: edziban so nnyi hɔ: Na ndɔbaa pii dze

column2: "Ɔdasefo nokwafo rinndzi ator: Na ɔdasefo torfo dze
"Ɔtwetwesifo hwehwɛ nyansa
column4: ɔyɛ mberɛw ma nyia ɔwɔ ntseasee."

column2: "Fi ɔkwasea n’enyim kɔ
column3: Osiandɛ innkohu nyimdzee nsɛm biara wɔ no ho."

column2: "Ɔbadwembanyi ne nyansaa nye dɛ ɔtse no kwan ase: Na nkwasea hɔn nkwaseadze nye hɔn ndaadaa."
"Nkwasea si afɔdzi ho atwetwe: Na tɔɔtsenyɛfo mu na enyisɔ wɔ."
"Akoma nyim noara n’awerɛhow: Na ɔhɔho mmfa noho nngyegye ne dɛw mu."
"Emumuyɛfo fie bobutuw: Na atseneneefo asese dze
"Ɔkwan bi wɔ hɔ a ɔyɛ dɛ ɔtsen ma nyimpa
"Ɔserew mu mpo
column3: akoma dzi yaw: Na enyigye n’ewiei

column2: "Akoma mu okyirsannyi noara n’akwan bɛhyɛ noara ma: Na nyimpa papa fi noara no ho bɛmee."
"Ntsetsekwaa gye asɛm biara dzi: Naaso ɔbadwembanyi dze
"Onyansafo suro
column3: na oyi mbusu akwa: Naaso ɔkwasea dze
column4: ɔyɛ nyiyiano na ɔgye noho dzi."

column2: "Nyia ɔnnkyɛr ebufuw fa no
column3: odzi nkwaseasɛm: Na nyimpa a ɔhyehyɛ emumuyɛ no dze

column2: "Nkwaseadze bra ntsetsekwaa: Na abadwembafo dze
"Mbusubɔfo kotow apapafo enyim: Na emumuyɛfo kotow atseneneefo aponkɛse enyim."
"Ohianyi noara no sɔnmufo mpo kyir no: Naaso obirɛmpɔn dze
"Nyia obu ne sɔnmunyi bi enyimtsia no
column3: ɔyɛ bɔn: Na nyia ohu ohianyi mbɔbɔr no dze

column2: "Ana hɔn a wosusu mbusu no
column3: wɔmmfom bi a? Na hɔn a wosusu papa no dze

column2: "Ɔberɛ nyinara mu wɔ mfaso: Anosɛm dze
"Enyansafo hɔn abɔtsir nye hɔn ahonya: Na nkwasea hɔn nkwaseadze nye nkwaseadze ara nko."
"Ɔdasefo nokwafo gye akra nkwa: Na nyia odzi ator no dze
"EWURADZE ho suro mu na awerɛhyɛmu wɔ. Na ne mba benya guandɔbea."
"EWURADZE ho suro yɛ nkwa nsunyiwa Dɛ wɔdze yi owu efir akwa."
"Nyimpadodow mu na ɔhen n’enyimnyam wɔ: Na no nkorɔfo sa a
"Nyia ɔfa ebufuw nyaa no
column3: ɔwɔ ntseasee kɛse: Na nyia no bo haw no no ɔma nkwaseadze do."

column2: "Akoma pa yɛ honam no nkwa: Na enyitan dze
"Nyia ɔtseetsee ɔbɔbɔfo no
column3: ogu ne Yɛfo n’enyim ase: Na nyia ohu ohianyi mbɔbɔr no dze

column2: "Wosun obusuyɛfo kyen wɔ no mbusubɔ mu: Na ɔtseneneenyi dze
column3: ɔwɔ enyidado wɔ no wu mu."

column2: "Nyansa tse nyia ɔwɔ ntseasee no n’akoma mu: Na dza ɔwɔ nkwasea hɔn mu dze
"Ndzeyɛtsenenee na ɔma ɔman do: Na bɔn dze
"Ɔhen n’enyimpa wɔ akowaa onyimdzefo do: Na n’ebufuw dze
column3: ɔwɔ nyia ɔdze enyimguase ba no do."
